Privacy Policy

I take your privacy very seriously.


Tech Trends does not collect any user data, and all sensitive information (passwords and other account information) is stored securely in the local application database on your device.


Tech Trends will use the following permissions to provide you with the service.


- Access Network permission (to access online content as you specify)

- Get network status permission (to determine if the device currently has available network conditions)

- Background service permission (to automatically sync your favorites for you on a regular basis)



Third Party Services

This policy does not apply to third-party services that you use with Tech Trends . You can review the privacy policies of the third-party services you use on their websites



Disclaimers

Tech Trends is a content collection tool only. Your use of Tech Trends is subject to the laws and regulations of your country and region, and any liability arising from your actions will be borne by you personally.
